author: cnbc.com
title: Ardelyx posts 4Q profit
text:
FREMONT, Calif. (AP) _ Ardelyx Inc. (ARDX) on Wednesday reported fourth-quarter net income of $10.1 million, after reporting a loss in the same period a year earlier.
The Fremont, California-based company said it had net income of 21 cents per share.
The biotechnology company posted revenue of $42 million in the period.
For the year, the company reported that its loss narrowed to $64.3 million, or $1.36 per share. Revenue was reported as $42 million.
Ardelyx shares have decreased 16 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Wednesday, shares hit $5.55, a drop of 60 percent in the last 12 months.
